response.original_title: The Beatles’ “Abbey Road” in DTS-HD MA
response.overview: Experience the legendary sound of The Beatles’ “Abbey Road” with the unparalleled clarity of DTS-HD Master Audio 7.1 Surround mix on Blu-ray. Released in 1969, this iconic album features timeless tracks like “Come Together,” “Something,” and “Here Comes the Sun,” showcasing the band’s musical brilliance and innovative studio techniques12.  With DTS-HD MA Surround, every note and harmony is delivered with stunning precision, enveloping you in a rich, multi-dimensional audio experience. The high-definition audio format preserves the intricate arrangements and pioneering recording techniques, offering an immersive listening experience for audiophiles and Beatles fans alike12.  Rediscover “Abbey Road” and immerse yourself in the album that defined an era, now with the exceptional sound quality of DTS-HD Master Audio Surround on Blu-ray.
response.title: The Beatles’ “Abbey Road” in DTS-HD MA
